snippet.title: Google Spotlight Stories: Age of Sail Trailer
snippet.description:
*2019 3X EMMY® AWARD WINNER FOR PRODUCTION DESIGN, CHARACTER DESIGN, & COLOR*
*2018 OFFICIAL SELECTION VENICE FILM FESTIVAL*
*SHORTLISTED 91ST OSCARS BEST ANIMATED SHORT*

Watch the trailer for Age of Sail, directed by Academy Award winning director John Kahrs. Set on the open ocean in 1900, Age of Sail is the story of an old sailor adrift and alone in the North Atlantic. Featuring the voice talents of Ian McShane and Cathy Ang.

Subscribe to our channel here: https://youtube.com/gss 

Download our shows on Google Play here:  https://goo.gl/ja7WuV
Download our shows on iTunes here:  https://goo.gl/isV3QE
Download Age of Sail on Steam: https://goo.gl/PbcV7K
Download Age of Sail on Viveport: https://bit.ly/2z7BHbX

Learn more about Google Spotlight Stories: https://atap.google.com/spotlight-stories/

Follow us on Twitter @  https://twitter.com/GoogleATAP
